data.message: I received an email from facebook 1 Hacker Way in Menlo Park, CA stating balance on my ad account is empty.  I never created any ad account and they say I owe a bal.  Is this authentic?  If so, how do I make sure there is no active ad in error?

replies.message: Hey Marsha. It sounds like you've received a spam message. Do not click on any suspicious links you may have received. Facebook will never request your password over email, and we advise against providing your information to anyone under any circumstances. Please report this message as spam using this tip: http://bit.ly/2lTGY0y. -Joe
